lines.text: There's no such thing as honor among thieves. It's a myth.
I've got an idea. Why don't you sit down at your desk and write down all your complaints, and when I come back, we can have one of those long arguments you like so much.
You don't look like a maid.
I'm not, I'm the nanny. Do I look like a nanny?
No.

[flirting in broken English]
I never see anybody to fish in the grass before.
Frank ever come on to you?
He have a beautiful wife.
Oh. *She* ever come on to you?
So where are we going?
Ah, we got about 4 hours to Cuba.
Oh really. It took me a week - 15 of us on a very small boat.
I can turned around if you want.
No, it's okay. I like the water. Even when we were coming over, the sea was so beautiful. I never wanted to sleep, I was happy. I was ashamed to be so happy. People were dying.
Look, I got an idea. Why don't you sit down at your desk and write out all your complaints, then when I get back we can have one of those nice long fights that you like so much.
What is that, some sort of Latin concept, kill the one you love?
What are you doing here?
I came to see the cats.
The only fish I wanna see is on a plate with a piece of lemon.
[last lines]
You need to hurry.
This is not an ocean front suite, in Marbella. Did you notice that?
[Breathing]
There's no
[Coughs]
There are no flowers or champagne from the management. I don't, I don't see a swiss *chocolate* on my pillow
[Coughing]
. My *masseuse* is not at the door.
[Coughing]
[Wheezing]
[long pause]
And I am, **fucking** **dying** Alex!
Take it easy, Vic.
